00005 //This file documents the interface between the sock module and the
00006 //adjacent modules, both the lower-level modules (TCP and UDP) and
00007 //the minet stubs.
00008 //
00009 //the file "sockint.semantics" gives more information on the interface
00010 //to lower-level modules.
00011

00023 const unsigned NUM_SOCK_TYPES=6;
00024 enum srrType {CONNECT=0, ACCEPT=1, WRITE=2, FORWARD=3, CLOSE=4, STATUS=5};
00025 enum slrrType {mSOCKET, mBIND, mLISTEN, mACCEPT, mCONNECT, mREAD, mWRITE,
00026                mRECVFROM, mSENDTO, mCLOSE, mSELECT, mPOLL, mSET_BLOCKING,
00027                mSET_NONBLOCKING, mCAN_WRITE_NOW, mCAN_READ_NOW, mSTATUS};

00032 struct Connection {
00033   IPAddress src, dest;
00034   unsigned short srcport, destport;
00035   unsigned char  protocol;
00036 
00037   Connection(const IPAddress &s,
00038              const IPAddress &d,
00039              const unsigned short sport,
00040              const unsigned short destport,
00041              const unsigned char  proto);
00042   Connection(const Connection &rhs);
00043   Connection();
00044   virtual ~Connection();
00045   Connection & operator=(const Connection &rhs);
00046 
00047   void Serialize(const int fd) const;
00048   void Unserialize(const int fd);
00049 
00050   bool MatchesSource(const Connection &rhs) const ;
00051   bool MatchesDest(const Connection &rhs) const ;
00052   bool MatchesProtocol(const Connection &rhs) const;
00053   bool Matches(const Connection &rhs) const;
00054 
00055   std::ostream & Print(std::ostream &rhs) const;
00056 
00057   friend std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &os, const Connection& L) {
00058     return L.Print(os);
00059   }
00060 };

00062 struct SockRequestResponse {
00063   srrType    type;

00065   Buffer     data;
00066   unsigned   bytes;

00072                       const int &err);

00141 #define EOK                       0
00142 // #define EREQUEST_TOKEN   1
00143 // #define ESUPPLY_TOKEN    2
00144 #define EBASE                     4
00145 #define ENOMATCH                  EBASE+1
00146 #define EWHAT                     EBASE+2
00147 #define EBUF_SPACE                EBASE+3
00148 #define ESET_SELECT               EBASE+4
00149 #define ECLEAR_SELECT             EBASE+5
00150 // other errors are EBASE + positive int
00151 #define EUNKNOWN                  EBASE+6
00152 #define ERESOURCE_UNAVAIL         EBASE+7
00153 #define EINVALID_OP               EBASE+8
00154 #define ENOT_IMPLEMENTED          EBASE+9
00155 #define ENOT_SUPPORTED            EBASE+10
00156 #define EWOULD_BLOCK              EBASE+11
00157 #define ECONN_FAILED              EBASE+12
